sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Intel Corp ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, Intel Corp has lost about 3.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is United Technologies Corp ( UTX ), trading down 1.9%.
United Technologies Corp is lower by about 1.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 1.5%, and McDonald's Corp ( MCD ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
